entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Gjoa Haven

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
